text: Travel has a lot of happy days it's
mostly fun experiences lots of smiles
and learning but the downfalls of travel
sometimes outweigh the ups oh like
flight delays getting scammed and
gaining weight I am not as skinny as I
used to be and definitely in the worst
shape of my life here was me three
months ago and this is me now 15 pounds
heavier and feeling a lot more unhealthy
and lazy this has come as a result of
constant jet lag changing time zones
climates cuisines a lack of sanitation
doesn't going everywhere I can't see and
in my current case food poisoning that I
picked up in Cambodia the majority of my
meals these days are either airplane
food hotel buffets or street food to
make things even worse
my bad eating habits are combined with a
lack of working out
I have no routine I do walk 5 to 10k per
day and try to hike and play sports
whenever possible almost close with the
race but it's just not enough I've tried
to motivate myself a million times to
start working out 100 pushups in the
morning a few gym classes but it usually
lasts for about a week and impossible to
keep up when I fly over an ocean and
then I'm busy all day filming that being
said Deanna and I will be moving to
Bangkok next month and we are planning
to join a gym and workout everyday I'm
gonna take more tile essence and focus
on eating healthy again this video is
not to complain about my travel
lifestyle because I wouldn't change it
for anything else I love seeing the
world and I have my eyes set on visiting
every country which I'm getting closer
and closer I'm just explaining to you
the unseen side of constant travel and
some of the health challenges I face on
a daily basis so now I'm gonna open up
the floor to you do you have any advice
to share I would love to hear about how
you maintain a healthy life on the road
I'm drew pinsky and if you like my
travel videos please click Subscribe and
join me as I plan to visit every country
in the world
